Entries.rsv.trash: This is just plain old trash.
Entries.rsv.blocked: There seems to be something blocking the way.
Entries.rsv.crystal: It's some kind of crystal.#For some reason, you really don't think you should touch it...
Entries.rsv.cleantrash: It's empty. Looks like the garbage was collected early in the morning.
Entries.rsv.noquestboard: There's a note in the board. It reads...#'Closed until further notice - Lenny'
Entries.rsv.2: Log Cabin Hotel #The ultimate mountainside experience!#Residents: Richard, Philip, Ysabelle and Flor.
Entries.rsv.4: Kobayashi Residence #Shiro and Yuuma live here.
Entries.rsv.5: This swing looks like it's never been used.
Entries.rsv.6: Eubank Residence#Kenneth lives here.#'Need anything fixed? Come on in!'
Entries.rsv.7: This a doghouse with no dog.#Who let the dog out?
Entries.rsv.8: Someone lit a bonfire here recently.
Entries.rsv.9: Winters Residence#Ian lives here.#'You call, I haul!'
Entries.rsv.10: The sign has been cut cleanly in half.#It looks like it was cut with some sort of blade...
Entries.rsv.11: The statue is spooky.#You'd rather not touch it.
Entries.rsv.12: Someone seems to be living inside this grassy hut.#It seems a little small for a human, though.
Entries.rsv.13: There are several flasks in here, collecting rainwater.
Entries.rsv.14: It's a bucket.#Really, just a bucket.
Entries.rsv.16: Algae and microorganisms seem to thrive in this little aquarium.
Entries.rsv.17: Someone carved something into the tree.#It says:#K < T.
Entries.rsv.18: Round and round, the mill goes round and round again.
Entries.rsv.19: Liden Residence#Bert, Olga and Trinnie live here.
Entries.rsv.20: The jars are full of fruit preserves.#They smell good!
Entries.rsv.21: Fruit drops when it's ripe.#Then it gets collected and made into preserves.
Entries.rsv.24: This shipping bin is filled to the brim.
Entries.rsv.25: It looks like someone scratched 'L + F' here with a blade.
Entries.rsv.26: It's for children to play on.#It's old and rusty. No one's played on this in a long time.
Entries.rsv.27: It looks like one of the structures on your farm.
Entries.rsv.28: Ridgeside Forest#SOUTH: Water Research Facility and Laboratory#WEST: Community Greenhouse
Entries.rsv.29: What did the bee say to the other bee?#Honey, I'm home!
Entries.rsv.31: You want to hug this tree but you're afraid people will judge you!
Entries.rsv.33: Akina Residence#Pika and Keahi live here.
Entries.rsv.34: Pretty sure I saw this horse walk into the Stardrop Saloon.
Entries.rsv.36: A worn-down workbench#Jeric sure keeps busy.
Entries.rsv.37: An old motorcycle.#Looks like Jeric's working on it.
Entries.rsv.38: This chicken is free from society's yoke.
Entries.rsv.40: I wonder who made this beautiful arrangement!
Entries.rsv.41: Ezekiel seems to be brewing his own beer.
Entries.rsv.42: Daniels Residence#Ezekiel and Corine live here.
Entries.rsv.43: A cooler filled with Joja cola.
Entries.rsv.44: Pika's pantry.#It's full of tasty ingredients!
Entries.rsv.45: There are a lot of jars full of different ingredients stored.
Entries.rsv.46: Pika's kitchen is so clean.#I better not touch anything.
Entries.rsv.50: Someone left a bottle of wine here.#There's still some left.
Entries.rsv.51: I said hi to the horse.#The horse said hey.
Entries.rsv.nobalcony: The balcony is locked. There's a sign:#'Reserved for special occasions.'
Entries.rsv.aguarbasement1: It's a tome full of magic spells.#It's written in a language you can't read.
Entries.rsv.aguarbasement2: It smells like garlic!#You manage to resist the urge to taste it.
Entries.rsv.aguarbasement3: It's a pile of magic books.#The one on top says:#'Laundry Spells 101.'
Entries.rsv.aguarlab3: A clean sink. Mr. Aguar is not a slob.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab4: The fridge is filled with frozen food and canned soda
Entries.rsv.aguarlab5: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Biological Diversity' by Zoe Angofel.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab6: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Water? - I Barely Know Her' by Charles Sparkie.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab7: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Rocks Rock, Or Do They?' by Avi Slone.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab8: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'The Hot Professor' by M.A. Maesh.#You put it back quickly.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab9: It's full of samples.#Some of them look like they're glowing.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab10: This looks like some kind of cooler for test tubes.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab11: It's some kind of urn. It's filled with water.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab12: A flask filled with dirty water.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab13: They say a Frozen Tear is Yoba crying because you don't eat your veggies.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab14: It's a jar of... mayonnaise?#...#That... is not mayonnaise.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab15: A beautiful blue orb.#Somehow you can't stop staring at it.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab16: Professor's Log 63:#No anima found in sample 46.#Additional reasearch is required.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab18: The note says:#'Mitotic cellular division present in sample 126.'#The I's are dotted with tiny hearts.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab19: It's a To-Do List. It says:#Buy 1200 test tubes#2 Erlenmeyer flasks#That cute dress from Zuzu Apparel.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab20: It's a journal full of entries spanning multiple years.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab21: Dear Professor Salvador, ^My research has not yet borne fruit.^The anima traces are unexplainable.^The pulsating aura even more so.^There is an individual inhabiting that old man's farm.^They seem to have some magical affinity.^Maybe I should...^(The letter is unfinished)
Entries.rsv.aguarlab22: This looks like a spell scroll.#But instead of spells it has chemical formulas and equations.
Entries.rsv.aguarlab23: Weird...#This plant pot has tiny footprints in the soil.
Entries.rsv.alissa1: It's a notebook filled with unfinished songs.
Entries.rsv.alissa2: It's a song, written by Alissa:^'You look at me^ as if I'm the only girl around.^You make me feel important^ and never let me down.'^D - A7 - Bm - G
Entries.rsv.alissa3: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Lorem and Ipsum' by Peter Lace-Holder.
Entries.rsv.alissa4: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Ungulates Undulate' by O.B. Amoose.
Entries.rsv.alissa5: A collection of different colored threads and cloth.
Entries.rsv.alissa6: Alissa's private drawer. I better not touch this.
Entries.rsv.alissa7: It's a recipe for pancakes written by Olga.
Entries.rsv.alissa8: It's a box full of fruit! Looks like they're ready to be shipped.
Entries.rsv.alissa9: There seems to be a shiny object inside of the wall?#But it's emitting a cold, sharp sting when you try to reach in.
Entries.rsv.alissa10: Note to owner of the Everfrost Gem:#Do not attempt to break open. Mortal minds may not comprehend the -----#The remaining text seem to have... disappeared?
Entries.rsv.bert1: An old gridball helmet.#It says: 'Big Bad Bert' on the side.
Entries.rsv.bert2: The ball is a bit flat but it still rolls.#Looks like it's just for decoration...?
Entries.rsv.bert3: The trash can is empty.#Why do you keep looking into trash cans anyway?
Entries.rsv.bert4: There's a small piece of paper stuck in between the foam? It says:#'To do: Call Dad'
Entries.rsv.bert6: A silver backpack with a first aid kit, multiple canned goods, and a lollipop inside. There's a tag that says:#'Emergency Kit'
Entries.rsv.bert7: A little teddy bear. Small glitter stickers are stuck on its paws.
Entries.rsv.bert8: The living room clock does not seem to be working.
Entries.rsv.bert10: A new radio.#I bet this has amazing sound quality!
Entries.rsv.bert11: A collection of pictures of the Lidens.
Entries.rsv.bert12: Zuzu City Tunnelers!#Learn about your favorite players here!
Entries.rsv.bert13: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Woodchuck Calculus' by Ash Nine.
Entries.rsv.bert14: Olga and Bert's dresser. I shouldn't peek.
Entries.rsv.bert15: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Body of Art' by Bran Don.
Entries.rsv.bert16: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'I try Mechs' by I. Lavits.
Entries.rsv.bert17: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Harmonious Tubas' by Ether Yeal
Entries.rsv.bert18: Trinnie's dresser. It's filled with... candy?#Maybe I should tell Olga.
Entries.rsv.bert19: A doll house.#It almost looks like there's a tiny farmer doll inside...
Entries.rsv.bert20: There is a sticker spelling out 'Koko' on the pot.
Entries.rsv.bert21: There's a small sticker with the name 'Pipo' on it.
Entries.rsv.bert22: A sticker with the name 'Lil Tomtom' is on the pot.
Entries.rsv.cablecar1: You read the inscription on the gravestone:#'In loving memory of Pegasus, the horse that could fly.#Though your body was never found, may you lie here in peace.'
Entries.rsv.ezekiel1: Even a broken clock is right twice a day.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel4: The trashcan smells like apples.#Why did you sniff a trashcan?
Entries.rsv.ezekiel5: Old army boots. They're caked with shoe shine.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel6: A golden ring with a chest-shaped top. It looks like it can be opened.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel7: It looks like one of those flares for emergencies.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel8: A large anchor on display. The inscription says 'SS Peacock'
Entries.rsv.ezekiel9: This ring has a beautiful aquamarine stone.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel10: The decorations remind you of the Calico Desert.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel11: There is an empty bag of chips inside this trashcan.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel13: It's an old rusty sword.#Dog tags are hanging from its hilt.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel14: Dear Helen,^^It's a new day. Corine has a job at the local restaurant now. Everything is fine. I miss you. We're planning to visit your grave tomorrow.^^Love, Zeke.#It looks like this letter was written a very long time ago.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel16: Corine's desk.#There is a notebook with a list of jobs.#Looks like she's looking for her dream job...
Entries.rsv.ezekiel17: A tray with a half-finished bag of chips and a can of soda.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel18: Corine's dresser. It's locked.#Or is it?#Yes, it is.
Entries.rsv.ezekiel19: This side of the bookshelf is full of martial arts books!
Entries.rsv.ezekiel20: This side of the bookshelf is full of fashion magazines!
Entries.rsv.ezekiel22: An old doll house. It's really dusty.#Like, really, really dusty.
Entries.rsv.freddie1: Lola's spinning wheel. It's in tip-top condition!
Entries.rsv.freddie2: Different types of silk and thread are stored in the shelf.
Entries.rsv.freddie3: There is an half-burned picture album in the fireplace.
Entries.rsv.freddie5: Lola and Freddie's dresser.#You'd rather not look in there.
Entries.rsv.freddie6: None of these books have covers.
Entries.rsv.freddie7: An old photo album?#It looks like all the pictures were ripped out.
Entries.rsv.freddie8: There's a letter hidden behind a broken plank.#'To my Freddie.'#Better not open it.
Entries.rsv.freddie9: There's a letter hidden behind a crooked painting.#'To my Lola'#Better not open it.
Entries.rsv.ian1: It's a children's book:#'Learn how to read with Dr. Alphabet'.
Entries.rsv.ian2: Ian's personal dresser and drawer.# I should not mess with it.
Entries.rsv.ian3: An empty plate and cup.# Both have been recently washed.
Entries.rsv.ian4: A model ship. It's a work in progress.
Entries.rsv.ian5: The clock is not working.#Maybe its time was up?
Entries.rsv.ian6: An empty small desk drawer. Looks like it was recently finished.
Entries.rsv.ian7: The sculpture looks familiar, sort of. It's not very well done.
Entries.rsv.ian8: A huge bear statue! It only has the shape though with no details.
Entries.rsv.ian9: An empty plant pot. There's no soil inside either.
Entries.rsv.ian10: The fireplace seems like it hasn't been recently used.
Entries.rsv.ian11: There are sheets of paper in the couch with rows of carefully-written but mess letters.
Entries.rsv.ian12: A cleanly sharpened axe and pickaxe. Properly cared for.
Entries.rsv.jeric1: Fresh fruit and vegetables for sale.
Entries.rsv.jeric3: This bookshelf is full of books on farming.
Entries.rsv.jeric4: You pull out a magazine and read the cover:#Farm to Dresser - The Farmer's Fashion Guide
Entries.rsv.jeric5: Jeric's drawer smells like cologne.#You want to peek but you manage to control your curiosity.
Entries.rsv.jeric6: You find a small calendar with planting and harvesting dates.
Entries.rsv.jeric7: It's a rolled up excercise mat used for exercise. It's a little moist
Entries.rsv.jeric8: A weighted barbell. It's quite heavy.
Entries.rsv.kenneth1: Kenneth's drawer. Better not open this.
Entries.rsv.kenneth2: Kenneth's PC.#He's on the JojaCord app.#There are several people typing.
Entries.rsv.kenneth3: It looks like a disassembled microwave.
Entries.rsv.kenneth4: The small monitor has a beeping green bar in the upper left corner of the screen.
Entries.rsv.kenneth5: The huge monitor seems to have been partially disassembled.
Entries.rsv.kenneth6: It's a game console! A Pepper Kong cartridge is inserted in the game slot.
Entries.rsv.kenneth7: The trash can has a pile of crumpled papers inside.
Entries.rsv.kenneth8: The computer monitor shows the SMOOPY console open.#It reminds you of an angel.
Entries.rsv.kenneth10: 'Diverse Fundamentals of Robotics and Advanced Engineering' by Ray Feasaz
Entries.rsv.kenneth12: Dear Dad,#I'm doing fine.#I recently met with your old friend Demetrius.#Will post notes.#The letter is unfinished
Entries.rsv.kenneth13: A recently fixed radio.#It's currently playing the 'Jason Shuffle' by the Space Chasers
Entries.rsv.kenneth14: An old game console. It's been completely taken apart.
Entries.rsv.kenneth15: A machine of some kind. The parts inside don't seem to match.# But there are traces of tinkered bolts and screws all around.
Entries.rsv.lenny1: It's Lenny's radio. It looks pretty new.
Entries.rsv.lenny2: The trashcan is empty. It's a trash can't.
Entries.rsv.lenny3: Delicious Recipes for Workaholics' by I.M. Bizzi.
Entries.rsv.lenny4: It's Lenny's desk. It's made of mahogany.
Entries.rsv.lenny6: Lenny's dresser. You don't have the guts to peek.
Entries.rsv.lenny7: You pull out a book. It's a romantic novel titled 'Animal Instincts'.#You put it back quickly.
Entries.rsv.lenny8: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'History of Stardew Valley' by Oswald Bamoose.
Entries.rsv.lenny9: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Famous Journeys' by M. Jasper
Entries.rsv.lenny10: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Geekonomics' by Steven & Stephen.
Entries.rsv.lenny11: It's Lenny's computer. She's watching StarFlix.
Entries.rsv.lenny12: Lenny is reading a romance novel called 'Stallion.'#You read a paragraph...#You regret reading a paragraph.#You put it back quickly.
Entries.rsv.lolashed1: There's some kind of smoke inside of this onyx ring!
Entries.rsv.lolashed2: The amethyst gem on top of the ring is calling you to pick it.#You barely manage to yank your hand back and turn away.
Entries.rsv.lolashed3: This is a topaz ring. It looks like it's glowing.
Entries.rsv.lolashed4: Woah! Look all this gold! You could buy a lot of stuff with this.
Entries.rsv.lolashed5: It's an aquamarine ring. It looks...wet?
Entries.rsv.lolashed6: Woah! This jade ring has blood on it!
Entries.rsv.lolashed7: It's an emerald ring. The emerald is huge!
Entries.rsv.lolashed8: These boots seem to have hidden blades below the soles.#I better not touch these or I might get hurt.
Entries.rsv.lolashed9: A collection of metal bars and weapons.
Entries.rsv.lolashed10: It's a suit of armor. I think this was Lola's.
Entries.rsv.lolashed11: It's a suit of armor. I think this was Freddie's.
Entries.rsv.lolashed12: These swords are sharp! They look freshly sharpened.
Entries.rsv.lolashed13: Souveniers from Lola and Freddie's past adventures.
Entries.rsv.hotel1: It's an old scroll on display chronicling the history of Ridgeside Village.
Entries.rsv.hotel2: It's a pretty painting of the Calico Desert.
Entries.rsv.hotel3: It's a guest book.#Looks like your Grandpa visited the hotel often.
Entries.rsv.hotel4: A check-in form. I already have a house nearby, so I shouldn't bother.
Entries.rsv.hotel5: It's a laptop. You want to take a peek but you remember that's a privacy violation.
Entries.rsv.hotel6: It's the Hotel Lobbby Computer. What did you just learn about privacy?
Entries.rsv.hotel7: The file cabinet is locked. Why were you looking in there anyway?
Entries.rsv.hotel8: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Blenders: What if?' by Bea Verina.
Entries.rsv.hotel9: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Everything You need to Know and More' Rae Vendeth
Entries.rsv.hotel10: A giant piano. If only you knew how to play.
Entries.rsv.hotel11: A magazine. The page it's open to has an automobile advertisment.
Entries.rsv.hotel13: Flor's dresser. I shouldn't touch it.
Entries.rsv.hotel15: Ysabelle's dresser. She'd be furious if I touched this.
Entries.rsv.hotel17: The desk is covered in neatly-organized makeup palettes, bottles and compacts, and the mirror is ringed with lightbulbs.
Entries.rsv.hotel18: It's a 10 lbs dumbell set aside carelessly
Entries.rsv.hotel19: The laptop has a classy black marking on the edge with the text 'Ysa < '
Entries.rsv.hotel20: The guitar is missing a string.
Entries.rsv.hotel21: A weighted barbell. Seems to be 25 lbs.
Entries.rsv.hotel22: Philip's dresser and study drawer. I should leave it be.
Entries.rsv.hotel23: Kinesiology and Physiology. Written by Raf S. Eazz.
Entries.rsv.hotel24: You pull out a comic book and read the cover:#The Cosmic Vengeance, written by Karl Basket.
Entries.rsv.hotel25: A pile of varying books. Some of them look like sci-fi novels.
Entries.rsv.hotel26: A globe with little pins stuck in almost every country. There's a note attached at the top: # 'Someday...'
Entries.rsv.hotel27: Somebody threw away a small piece of gold! Must be by accident.
Entries.rsv.hotel28: You pull out an old photo album.#It's full of pictures of Richard and his family.
Entries.rsv.hotel29: Hospitality 101: The art of providing a second home.
Entries.rsv.hotel30: The trash can is empty and clean. So clean!
Entries.rsv.hotel31: It's a ballet barre. It looks recently installed.
Entries.rsv.hotel32: I wonder if I should work out more.
Entries.rsv.hotel33: Someone etched something into this bench.#It says:'BE HAPPY AGAIN'
Entries.rsv.logcabinhotel1: It's an urn. Better not touch it.
Entries.rsv.maddie1: Each book seem to have tons of bookmarks in different pages!
Entries.rsv.maddie2: Inside the drawer are different novels of varying genres.
Entries.rsv.maddie3: The topmost book has the title 'The Principles of the Cellular World'
Entries.rsv.maddie4: The current screen shows an online shopping site search page. The search is 'cute dresses'
Entries.rsv.maddie5: Marine Biology and Botany - A published collection of research by the Wale Academy
Entries.rsv.maddie6: It's a cute pop up book of the 'Flying Dogs of Princess Rara'.
Entries.rsv.maddie7: A collection of thesis reports and folders are neatly placed in the shelf.
Entries.rsv.maddie8: Magic and the Theory Behind its Existence.# It's a huge book with bookmarks marking multiple pages.
Entries.rsv.maddie9: A pile of notebooks of varying colors and designs. The topmost one has a kitten face on it.
Entries.rsv.maddie11: Maddie's personal computer. It's asking for a password.
Entries.rsv.pika1: The cooler has lots of beverages inside!
Entries.rsv.pika2: There are frozen fish inside the cooler.
Entries.rsv.pika3: A delicious-looking meal! Maybe a new recipe?
Entries.rsv.pika4: A pretty blue shell necklace. It looks clean and well kept. A picture of a woman is beside it.
Entries.rsv.pika5: A photo album of an unfamiliar place. The place looks like a tropical island, and everyone is wearing clothes you've never seen before.
Entries.rsv.pika6: It's an old diary. It doesn't seem to belong to Pika.
Entries.rsv.pika7: Pika's drawer. I shouldn't mess with his stuff.
Entries.rsv.pika8: The guitar is a little dirty.
Entries.rsv.pika9: The radio is playing an upbeat song when you turn it on.
Entries.rsv.sign1: Ridgeside Village# Cable Car to Pelican Town
Entries.rsv.sign3: WARNING!#Please secure your horse in the horse compartment.#We don't want another 'Pegasus' incident.#- Lenny
Entries.rsv.sign4: > Cable Car to Pelican Town#WARNING!#Watch out for falling debris during rainy days.
Entries.rsv.bench: Someone carved 'P & C' into this tree. How romantic.'
Entries.rsv.cliffblock: Something big is blocking the way. There's no way through.
Entries.rsv.ninja1: 'Keep an eye on the old man's farm.'#'Await further instructions.#-H'
Entries.rsv.ninja2: The books are all written in different languages.
Entries.rsv.ninja3: A collection of sharp weapons!#I might hurt myself if I touch any of these.
Entries.rsv.ninja4: These look like cherry bombs...#...with magical runes imprinted on them.
Entries.rsv.ninja5: The sword is emitting an ominous aura.
Entries.rsv.shiro2: The trash can is full of used bandages.
Entries.rsv.shiro3: Looks like Yuuma drew these. They look so good!
Entries.rsv.shiro4: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Lorem Ipsum' by Peter Laceholder.
Entries.rsv.shiro5: You pull out a book and read the cover:#'Lorem Ipsum' by Peter Laceholder.
Entries.rsv.shiro6: It's a pile of educational books for varying grade levels.
Entries.rsv.shiro8: There's a note attached to the flower. It reads:^'We will return home soon.^Please take care of each other.'
Entries.rsv.shiro10: It's a wheelchair#It seems it hasn't been used for a while now.
Entries.rsv.cliffhouseclose: This abandoned house has been boarded up.
Entries.rsv.undreyapeek: A figure covered in a black blanket... Is this Undreya?#Undreya: 'Shhh!! Don't be so loud, okay?'
Entries.rsv.grave1: There's a faded text engraved in the tomb.^The words can barely be read.^'He-e l--s -rth-r-'
Entries.rsv.brokencart: This cart looks broken. Better not touch it.
Entries.rsv.ridgeforest1: Here lies Buddy.#Your time was too short.
Entries.rsv.ridgeforest2: The text is too faded to read.
Entries.rsv.ridgeforest3: A loving father. You will be missed...
Entries.rsv.ridgeforest4: General Diggy Johnson^An honorable leader.^A---^The rest of the text is illegible.
Entries.rsv.treehouselock: This appears to be a tree house designed for children.#It may collapse if I go inside.
Entries.rsv.tentlock: There's a huge wooden crate blocking the entrance to the tent. I wonder who owns this?
Entries.rsv.fallshint1: Some kind of ancient scroll is embedded into the grass.#It reads...^^'8|13^You could hear the crashing waters near the pink trees.^Are there underground waterfalls here?'
Entries.rsv.fallshint2: Some kind of ancient scroll is embedded into the grass.#It reads...^^'1|27^The sound gets louder and louder! Am I near? This is driving me crazy!'
Entries.rsv.mysticfalls1: Mystic Falls of Companions^^'One who bonds with their neighbors and shares their joy and sorrow is blessed by Yoba.'
Entries.rsv.mysticfalls2: Mystic Falls of Love^^'Being able to catch the heart of someone is both a blessing and a curse. But in the presence of these waterfalls, love prefers to be a blessing.'
Entries.rsv.mysticfalls3: Mystic Falls of Sacrifice^^'Among the heaviest of burdens are the ones carried by those who fight for the greater good of all'
Entries.rsv.abandonedhouse1: 'When I'm gone, try to be a good girl, okay?^^Remember to eat lots, stay away from danger, and don't trust anyone.^^I'm sorry I can't live as long as you...'
Entries.rsv.abandonedhouse2: The boxes are full of recycled trash.
Entries.rsv.abandonedhouse3: There's a small note:#'Don't trust the red scarves'
